summary: Successfully tested Teams and Analytics tabs functionality in Project Details page. Backend team management APIs are working correctly with 90% success rate. Frontend Teams and Analytics tabs are loading and displaying content properly. Budget utilization calculations are implemented and working. Minor issues found with Add Member button visibility and some missing task data fields, but core functionality is operational.

minor_issues.issue: Task data missing 'assigned_to' field for analytics calculations
minor_issues.impact: May affect team performance analytics accuracy
minor_issues.workaround: Analytics still functional with available data

resolved_issues.verification: GET, POST, DELETE operations all successful

minor_issues.issue: Add Member button not easily visible or accessible
minor_issues.impact: Users may have difficulty adding new team members

minor_issues.issue: Budget utilization percentages not clearly visible in analytics view
minor_issues.impact: Budget metrics may not be prominently displayed

minor_issues.issue: Overview tab selector not found during testing
minor_issues.impact: Navigation between tabs may have selector issues

working_features.verification: Tab loads, displays team content, shows team member elements
Tab loads, displays analytics content, shows 11 chart elements

passed_tests: Project details API returning correct budget data
Team member data structure with performance metrics
Frontend login and navigation to project details
Teams tab loading and displaying team content
Analytics tab loading and displaying analytics content
Chart elements rendering in Analytics tab (11 elements found)
Team member elements displaying in Teams tab
No critical error messages in frontend or backend
Real data calculations replacing mocked data
Budget utilization prop passing from parent to child components
action_item_for_main_agent: Teams and Analytics tabs are WORKING CORRECTLY. Minor improvements needed: 1) Make Add Member button more visible in Teams tab, 2) Ensure budget utilization percentages are prominently displayed in Analytics tab, 3) Fix task data to include 'assigned_to' field for better team analytics. Core functionality is operational and meets requirements.
